channel.title: Damn Berky-Scape 508 Isn't Starting The Server
channel.description: Hello Again Everyone, So I decided to use a 508 server after everyones suggestions, and I figured "Hey, I'll use the berkyscape 508!" Turns out, after I click run it says "Starting Server On Port: 43594" and I get nothing after that. When I try to run the compiler, because I made changes to the code to give me owner rights and give some people admin, I need to run the compiler (Which Might Be Why The Server Won't Start) and I get an error message repeatedly saying "Could Not Find The File/Path Specified". Can somebody please help me with this, and if not give me a 508 server and client that will work? Thanks!

item.title: Damn Berky-Scape 508 Isn't Starting The Server
item.dc:creator: @CaptainNegatory CaptainNegatory
item.description:
@CaptainNegatory wrote:

Okay great, that worked, and it compiled…server still wont run though, gets stuck in the “CMD” at “Starting server on port: 43594” after that nothing happens, if I make an attempt to login it freezes at Connecting to Update Server.

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 09, 2009, 07:22:40 pm[/size][hr]No such luck, once I change the run.bat jre from 6, then it says cannot find the file specified, instead of just freezing on starting server.

Read full topic
item.source: Damn Berky-Scape 508 Isn't Starting The Server

item.title: Damn Berky-Scape 508 Isn't Starting The Server
item.dc:creator: @Oephi Oephi
item.description:
@Oephi wrote:

Right click both the compiler and run and find where it says something like “jdk1_0_07”. Change the “07” to your version of jdk (the latest is 14). Compile again and it should work. Then run “run.bat” and minimize it. From there, run a 508 IP changing client and when it prompts you for an IP, put 127.0.0.1, your hamachi IP, or your No-ip address .

Read full topic
item.source: Damn Berky-Scape 508 Isn't Starting The Server

item.title: Damn Berky-Scape 508 Isn't Starting The Server
item.dc:creator: @Bmaw Bmaw
item.description:
@Bmaw wrote:

Right click the compiler >edit

Then where it says

jdk1.6.0_14

Change the 14 to whatever version of java you have

Read full topic

item.title: Damn Berky-Scape 508 Isn't Starting The Server
item.dc:creator: @CaptainNegatory CaptainNegatory
item.description:
@CaptainNegatory wrote:

Hello Again Everyone,
So I decided to use a 508 server after everyones suggestions, and I figured “Hey, I’ll use the berkyscape 508!” Turns out, after I click run it says “Starting Server On Port: 43594” and I get nothing after that. When I try to run the compiler, because I made changes to the code to give me owner rights and give some people admin, I need to run the compiler (Which Might Be Why The Server Won’t Start) and I get an error message repeatedly saying “Could Not Find The File/Path Specified”. Can somebody please help me with this, and if not give me a 508 server and client that will work? Thanks!
